commands.fzmm.amount.help: Ändert die Anzahl an Gegenständen, die du in deiner Hand hast. Nützlich, um 64 Gegenstände von etwas zu haben, das nicht in 64 stapelbar ist.
commands.fzmm.equip.help: Tausch den Gegenstand in deiner Hand mit dem Gegenstand in deinem Rüstungsslot
commands.fzmm.fakeenchant.help: Fügt dem Gegenstand in der Hand Fake-Verzauberungen hinzu, also nur ein verzaubertes Leuchten und eine Zeile in der Item-Info mit der Verzauberungsübersetzung
commands.fzmm.fullcontainer.help: Fülle den Behälter deiner Haupthand mit dem Gegenstand aus deiner Zweithand. "Slots zu füllen" ist die Zahl wie oft der Gegenstand im Behälter platziert wird, standardmäßig ist der erste zu befüllende Slot 0
commands.fzmm.lock.help: Sperre den Container in deiner Haupthand ab und benenne den Gegenstand in deiner Zweithand mit dem eingegebenem Schlüssel
commands.fzmm.lore.add.help: Eine Zeile am Ende der Item-Info hinzufügen
commands.fzmm.lore.help:
Ändere die Item-Info des Gegenstands in deiner Hand
add: Füge eine Zeile am Ende hinzu
remove: Entfernt eine Zeile, wenn die Linie nicht angegeben ist, wird die letzte Linie entfernt, die Linien werden von oben nach unten gezählt
commands.fzmm.name.help: Ändere den Namen des Gegenstands in deiner Hand
commands.fzmm.skull.help: Hol dir den Kopf eines Spielers mit seinem Benutzernamen
fzmm.giveItem.exceedLimit: This item combined with the size of your inventory, exceeds the 8MB limit (%1$sKiB / %2$sKiB)
fzmm.giveItem.notAllowed: You are not allowed to give items in a non-creative game mode (item was saved in the history).
fzmm.gui.autoPlacer.label.baseRequiremen: You need to be in the ground
You need to look at a block
fzmm.gui.autoPlacer.label.sneakInfo:
If you try to place it while sneaking,
the auto-placer won't activate.
fzmm.gui.autoPlacer.title: Automatic placer
* Dieser Button ist aktiviert, wenn man die Symbol-Chat-Mod verwendet.
* Dieser Button ist nicht aktiviert, wenn die Mod vorhanden ist und
ein Fehler auftritt (bitte an FZMM melden).
fzmm.gui.button.symbolChat.symbol.toolti: Zeige eine Liste von Symbolen an, die in diesem Textfeld verwendet werden können.
fzmm.gui.converters.option.arrayToUuid.c:
Konvertiere die Listen UUID in eine Text UUID und kopiere diese in die Zwischenablage.
z.B.: 069a79f4-44e9-4726-a5be-fca90e38aaf5
fzmm.gui.converters.option.arrayToUuid.r: Füllt das Feld 'Text UUID' mit einer zufällig generierten UUID.
fzmm.gui.converters.option.copyDecoded.t:
Base64 dekodiert den Wert des Feldes 'Nachricht'
und kopiert ihn in die Zwischenablage.
fzmm.gui.converters.option.copyEncoded.t:
Base64 kodiert den Wert des Feldes 'Nachricht'
und kopiert ihn in die Zwischenablage.
fzmm.gui.converters.option.message.toolt: Nachricht zum Verschlüsseln oder Entschlüsseln in Base64.
fzmm.gui.converters.option.uuidField.too:
String UUID

Die UUID muss 32 hexadezimale Ziffern und 4 Bindestriche enthalten.
Beispiel: 069a79f4-44e9-4726-a5be-fca90e38aaf5
fzmm.gui.converters.option.uuidToArray.c:
Konvertiert die UUID in eine UUID in Form von
einer Liste und kopiert sie in die Zwischenablage.
Beispiel: [I;110787060,1156138790,-1514210135,238594805]
fzmm.gui.converters.option.uuidToArray.r: Füllen Sie die Liste mit zufälligen Zahlen.
fzmm.gui.converters.tab.arrayToUuid.tool:
Konvertiere eine Integer-Liste von 4 Werten zu einer UUID, das kann nützlich sein,
um den Wert einer UUID zu konvertieren, der von minecraft in höheren Versionen als UUID-String benötigt wird.
fzmm.gui.converters.tab.base64.tooltip:
Dekodieren und kodieren Sie die Nachricht in base64,
kann nützlich sein, um die Werte von Dingen wie
den Wert eines Kopfes zu erhalten.
fzmm.gui.converters.tab.uuidToArray.tool:
Konvertieren Sie eine UUID in eine Integer-Liste von 4 Werten, kann
nützlich sein, um einen Spieler UUID-String in einen Wert umzuwandeln, den
minecraft in Versionen nach 1.16 verwendet.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.bbcode.tooltip: Ich habe keine Ahnung, wo oder warum dies verwendet wird, zu schätzen, wenn Sie mich wissen lassen.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.chatDefault.too: Einige beliebte Plugins, die dieses Format verwenden, sind EssentialsX, etc.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.console.tooltip: Wird in der Server-Konsole in Spigot verwendet.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.json.tooltip: Gewöhnlich für tellraw benutzt, Namen, Hintergrundinfo, etc. verwendet.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.motd.tooltip: Wird in der Beschreibung der Server in der Mehrspieler-Liste verwendet.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.string.tooltip: Nützlich, wenn Sie Text ohne Formatierung kopieren möchten.
fzmm.gui.copyText.option.xml.tooltip: Wird in Minimessage und FabricPlaceholderAPI verwendet.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.addProfile.asymmetr:
Asymmetric encryption key, changes the value used for
encryption and decryption, but unlike the seed, it is not
shown in the translation key.

- "0" for disabled.
- If you are going to communicate with someone,
you must have the same value.
- If you are going to create one, it is recommended
to use a random value.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.addProfile.key.tool:
The translation key used to identify this profile.

"%s" will be replaced with the seed.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.addProfile.length.t:
Maximum characters for the message.

Unused characters will be filled with random characters.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.addProfile.oldAlgor:
The only difference between the previous algorithm and the current one is:

- Different results, so the items require the same algorithm.
- When encrypting or obtaining the decryptor, the previous
one has worse performance.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.addProfile.seed.too: The seed used to encrypt/decrypt the data.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.addProfile.title: Add encrypt/decrypt profile
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.getDecryptor.title: Get decryptor
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.label.removeDecrypt: Are you sure you want to remove this profile?
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.option.author: Buchautor
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.option.message.tool:
Die Nachricht die verschlüsselt wird und
auf Seite 1 des Buches platziert wird. Um es lesen zu können, wird die Dekodierung
benötigt (Weitere Informationen finden Sie in der Wiki).
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.option.paddingChara: Zeichen, die am Ende der Nachricht hinzugefügt werden, um die erforderliche Anzahl von Zeichen zu erreichen.
fzmm.gui.encryptbook.option.title: Buchtitel
fzmm.gui.fileDialog.image.title: Choose image file
fzmm.gui.headGallery.label.category.tool: Kategorie, zu der die Köpfe gehören müssen.
fzmm.gui.headGallery.label.error:
Error while fetching category '%s'
Cause: %s

More information in logs.
fzmm.gui.headGallery.label.tags.tooltip:
Schlagwort, zu dem die Köpfe gehören müssen
(wird nach der Kategorie angewendet)
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.label.layerList.t:
Liste der Ebenen, um einen zusammengesetzten Skin zu erzeugen,
die Ebenen werden von oben nach unten überlappt.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.label.noResults: Es wurden keine Texturen oder Modelle gefunden, dies liegt daran, dass Sie kein Ressourcenpaket platziert haben, das Texturen oder Modelle hinzufügt, Sie können das Ressourcenpaket mit den Standardtexturen "FZMM: Head Generator" aktivieren.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.model.error.loadi: FZMM: Ein Fehler ist beim laden von %s aufgetreten
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.option.headName.t:
Der Name des Spielers, zu dem der Kopf gehört (oder so wird er sagen)

Dieser Wert ist einfach ästhetisch.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.option.skin.toolt: Skin für den zu generierenden Kopf.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.option.skinPreEdi:
Pre-edit: None
It does not modify the skin.

Pre-edit: Overlap
It overlaps the second layer
of the skin on the first one.

Pre-edit: Remove
Removes the second skin layer.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.option.skinSource:
Name: Get the skin by the name of a premium player.
Path: Get the image of the path on your PC.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.snack_bar.error.e: An error occurred on the Mineskin API side (HTTP %s), try again later.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.snack_bar.error.i: If this error persists, report it to FZMM.
fzmm.gui.headGenerator.snack_bar.saveSki: An error occurred saving the skin
Could not find a skin to save
fzmm.gui.history.label.generatedWithFzmm:
All items that have been generated by a FZMM GUI or by /fzmm.
The maximum history can be changed in the config.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.label.imagetextSize:
Memory size: %s KiB
Size in text: %s KiB
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.bookPageMode.t:
Choose how the imagetext will be added to the book.

Add page: add a page at the end with the imagetext.
Create book: create a book with only the imagetext.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.bookTooltipMes: The text you hover over to see the imagetext.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.bookTooltipMod:
Choose how the imagetext will be added to the book.

Add page: add a page at the end with a message that has the imagetext.
Create book: create a book with only the message that has the imagetext.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.characters.too:
Characters that will be used in the imagetext,
this message will be repeated each time it ends until the line is completed
and it will have the color of the pixel where it is located.

Note: Leaving the default character will replace
all transparent pixels with spaces to simulate transparency.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.edgeDistance.t:
Distance at which the pixel to which the Edge threshold
is compared is located.
The amount of difference there can be between one pixel
and another to determine if it is a border, each character has 8 pixels.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.hologramPos.to: Coordinates where the hologram is going to be located.
Whether to use the hanging sign
version or the normal one.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.loreMode.toolt:
Choose how the imagetext will be added to the item's lore.

Add: add the imagetext to the end of existing lore's.
Replace: replace current lore with imagetext.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.percentageOfSi:
The way it works is that if a color is X% equal to
the previous one, that color is used, low values like 2.5%
usually have a good result to lower the size of the
NBT and they are not perceived.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.preserveImageA: Preserves the aspect ratio of the original image.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.resolution.too: Resolution to which the image will be resized.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.showResolution: Add a line with the resolution of the image at the end.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.signType.toolt: Type of sign material to be used.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.smoothImage.to: Image rescaling type, affects how the imagetext looks.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.textDisplayBac: Background color of the Text Display.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.textDisplayBil:
Controls whether the Text Display should follow
the player's face when rendering.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.textDisplayRot:
Text Display rotation, by default it will be rotated
to where you look when you open this GUI.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.textDisplayTex:
Where the text is aligned to, in Imagetext it is
only noticeable in the resolution line.
The opacity of the text (the alpha channel).
Whether the text is visible through blocks, entities, etc.
If true, the text has a shadow.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.armor.title: Armor
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.banner.option.isShie: If true it is a shield, otherwise it is a banner.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.banner.option.redo.t:
Redo

Hotkeys
Ctrl + Y
Ctrl + Shift + Z
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.banner.tab.addPatter: Add a pattern to the selected banner.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.banner.tab.changeCol:
Use Shift + Click to apply
to all with the same color
Changes the color of a pattern to that of the selected color.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.banner.tab.removePat: Remove a pattern from the selected banner.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.banner.title: Banner/Shield
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.block_state.label.em: This item has no block state.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.block_state.title: Block state
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.can_destroy.title: Can destroy
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.can_place_on.title: Can place on
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.color.title: Colorable item
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.container.option.inc:
This can be useful to store items
in non-container items and remove
them from this interface.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.container.title: Container
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.custom_model_data.la: This item does not have any Custom Model in the present resources packs.
You don't have any Custom Models loaded in any of your resources packs.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.durability.title: Armor/Tool damage
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.effect.label.duratio:
Format for time duration:

§7"1d 4h 15m 30s"§f = 1 day, 4 hours, 15 minutes, and 30 seconds
§7"20"§f = 20 ticks = 1 seconds
§7"inf"§f or §7"infinity"§f or §7"-1"§f = infinite time
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.effect.title: Status effect
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.enchant.title: Enchantments
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.filled_map.label.map:
This list of maps comes from the maps you currently
have loaded from the current world, they can be
loaded by viewing them in item frames or having
them in the inventory.

Note: maps with no content (100% transparent) have
been removed from this list.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.filled_map.title: Filled map
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.hide_flags.title: Hide flags
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.item_select.title: Select item
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.label.error.editorLa: An error occurred while getting the editor layout, please report this to FZMM.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.label.error.selectIt: An error occurred when selecting item %1$s (id: '%2$s'), please report this to FZMM.
fzmm.gui.itemEditor.skull.title: Head/Skull
fzmm.gui.option.image.fileDialog.tooltip: File dialog: Select the image you want to use from your PC.
fzmm.gui.option.image.head.tooltip: Head: load the skin by the player's head.
fzmm.gui.option.image.name.tooltip:
Name: load the skin by the player's name, first try to get
the image from the list of connected players (case sensitive),
if not found, get it from the premium account with that name.
fzmm.gui.option.image.screenshot.tooltip: Screenshot: Get a image of a Minecraft screenshot.
fzmm.gui.option.image.url.tooltip:
URL: Get the image from that url.
Note: the url must only contain the image and nothing else.
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.option.horizontal-: Direction that the statue will face
Horizontal direction that the statue will face when generated.
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.option.name: Statue name
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.option.name.toolti:
The name of the statue, supports JSON format
If this field is filled in, an armor stand will be added.

(Optional)
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.option.pos.tooltip: Coordinates where the statue will be located.
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.option.skin-source:
Name: Username of a premium account.
Path: Path of the image on your PC (supports 128x128!).
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.option.skin.toolti: Skin that the statue will have.
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.tab.generate.toolt:
Generate the statue of a player, which is 26 armor stands
which have in their right hand a head with a part of the skin inserted.

Note: generate a statue usually takes about 2 minutes.
fzmm.gui.playerStatue.tab.update.tooltip:
Update the player statue container in your hand with new values,
avoiding having to re-generate it to change place.
fzmm.gui.playerStatuePlacer.label.requir: Invalid yaw, try to rotate the camera
fzmm.gui.textFormat.error.messageLength: The message must be greater than 1 characters
fzmm.gui.textFormat.label.placeholderApi:
Examples of how to use Placeholder API, by placing
the cursor over it you can see the message used.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.brightness.to:
Brightness is the amount of white or black
mixed in with the color.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.finalColor.to: Color of the end of the message.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.gradientColor: List of colors to be applied to the gradient.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.hue.tooltip:
Hue is a degree on the color wheel from 0 to 1.
0 is red, 0.3333 is green, 0.6666 is blue.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.hueStep.toolt:
It is the advance between one letter
and another in the hue value.
Color of the beginning of the message.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.interleavedCo: List of colors to interleave in the text.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.message.toolt: The text to apply the format to.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.option.saturation.to:
Saturation is the intensity, or richness,
of that color.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.tab.interleaved_colo: Color text with multiple colors in interleaved order.
"It's a simple, string format inspired by formats like
HTML or MiniMessage. It was created to allow quick
and readable way of formatting Minecraft Text Components"
fzmm.gui.textFormat.tab.rainbow.tooltip: Color the text with colors in order of a color wheel.
fzmm.gui.textFormat.tab.simple.tooltip: Color the text with a color.
fzmm.item.error.actionNotAllowed: FZMM: This action is not allowed if you are not in creative mode.
fzmm.item.headGallery.heads.name: %s
fzmm.item.headGallery.heads.tags.title: Tags:
fzmm.item.imagetext.book.title: Imagebook
fzmm.item.imagetext.hologram.name: Imagetext: Hologram
fzmm.item.imagetext.sign.container.name: Imagetext: Sign
fzmm.item.imagetext.sign.details.name: These are a %sx%s of signs
fzmm.item.playerStatue.container.name: Player statue
fzmm.item.playerStatue.lore.1: Player statue part, put in a dispenser that
fzmm.item.playerStatue.lore.2: is §nFACING UP§r and activate the dispenser
fzmm.snack_bar.bookTooltip.overflow.deta: Try lowering the resolution to fix it
fzmm.snack_bar.bookTooltip.overflow.titl: Size limit of a book exceeded: %s/%s
fzmm.snack_bar.clipboard.title: Copied to clipboard
fzmm.snack_bar.entityDifficultToRemove.a: In multiplayer with plugins for editing armor stands and with permissions, for example ArmorStandEditor

Using the plugin item (flint by default), right-click on the air to open the interface. Select the "invisible" option and close the interface. With the plugin item, left-click on the armor stand, then hit the armor stand without the item to destroy it. Repeat the process until everything is deleted.
fzmm.snack_bar.entityDifficultToRemove.i: Before placing any entity, you should be aware that it is difficult to remove due to its invisibility
fzmm.snack_bar.entityDifficultToRemove.m: In multiplayer and none of the above worked
Call an admin and inform them that you made a mistake placing it or that you wish to remove it
fzmm.snack_bar.entityDifficultToRemove.o: Removes the invisibility from %1$s within a 3-block range, allowing you to delete them by hitting them
In singleplayer and multiplayer if you are an Operator/Admin
fzmm.snack_bar.entityDifficultToRemove.p: NOT RECOMMENDED: "/plot clear" will delete the entire plot, including problematic entities
fzmm.snack_bar.entityDifficultToRemove.w: If server has World Edit and have permissions
Cuts all entities and blocks in the selected area
fzmm.snack_bar.image.error.title: Error loading image
fzmm.snack_bar.image.loading.title: Loading image...
fzmm.snack_bar.image.successfully.title: Image loaded
fzmm.snack_bar.mineskin.error.invalidApi: The Mineskin API Key is invalid. Go to configs and fix it or remove it.
fzmm.snack_bar.playerStatue.error.title: Could not generate %1$s parts :(
fzmm.snack_bar.playerStatue.loading.deta:
Part name: %5$s
Parts generated: %1$s of %3$s
Generated errors: %2$s
Delay to generate the next: %4$s seconds
fzmm.snack_bar.playerStatue.secondTry.de:
Part name: %5$s
Remaining errors: %2$s
Delay to generate the next: %4$s seconds
Unstable TNT (if it breaks in survival it explodes)
Any mob to receive this name is rendered upside down.
itemGroup.op.nameTag.grumm.comment.1: Any mob to receive this name is rendered upside down.
itemGroup.op.nameTag.jeb_.comment.1: Naming a sheep "jeb_" causes its wool to fade between
itemGroup.op.nameTag.jeb_.comment.2: the dye colors, producing a rainbow effect
itemGroup.op.nameTag.johnny.comment.1: Naming a vindicator "Johnny" causes it to be
itemGroup.op.nameTag.johnny.comment.2: aggressive and attack all mobs including the wither
itemGroup.op.nameTag.toast.comment.1: Naming a rabbit "Toast" causes it to have a special memorial
itemGroup.op.nameTag.toast.comment.2: skin of user xyzen420's girlfriend's missing rabbit.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.fzmm: A fabric mod that is mainly for editing or creating NBT of items in creative but it also has a few utilities
text.config.fzmm.option.colors.headGalle: Name of the head in head gallery
Color of head tags in the lore.
text.config.fzmm.option.colors.imagetext: Color used in the description of Imagetext hologram.
Color of the resolution message of the Imagetext.
text.config.fzmm.option.colors.playerSta: Color used in Player Statue item names and descriptions.
text.config.fzmm.option.colors.usefulBlo:
Color used in the name and description in the creative
item group Useful block states.
text.config.fzmm.option.encryptbook.defa:
The default name of the book, the placeholder %s is replaced
by the translation key used in the book.
text.config.fzmm.option.encryptbook.padd:
Characters with which the book is filled to reach the maximum
number of characters in case the text is not long enough.
text.config.fzmm.option.encryptbook.sepa: Message that separates the encrypted message from the padding.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.disableI: Disable italic when adding a name or lore to an item.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.forceInv: Makes all item frames that have an item invisible.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.giveClie:
Makes it so items obtained using the mod are given client-side.

Note: if you open the inventory in creative the item is obtained server-side.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.showItem: Shows how much the item weighs in bytes/kilobytes in its tooltip.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.showSymb:
Show the button to add symbols to the left of some text fields,
it is required to use the Symbol Chat mod to be able to use it.
text.config.fzmm.option.headGallery.cach:
Save the loaded categories in the RAM to
avoid consulting to Minecraft heads again.
text.config.fzmm.option.headGallery.maxH: Maximum number of heads to be displayed on each page
text.config.fzmm.option.headGallery.styl: Add lore with head tags and give color to name and lore.
text.config.fzmm.option.history.automati:
Save the data from the last time you closed a screen
and restore it when you open it.

Note: no images or coordinates are saved.
text.config.fzmm.option.history.maxHeadH: Maximum number of heads to be saved in the history.
text.config.fzmm.option.history.maxItemH: Maximum number of items to be saved in the history.
text.config.fzmm.option.imagetext.defaul: The default text when using Imagetext book tooltip.
Item obtained when using Imagetext Lore and having no item in hand.
Default percentage of similarity to compress

The default value of percent similarity to compress,
the higher the value the more compressed the image will be,
it will also have less detail but its NBT will weigh less.

The way it works is that if a color is X%
equal to the previous one, that color is used.
Default imagetext value of preserve image aspect ratio of original image.
text.config.fzmm.option.itemEditorBanner:
The maximum number of undos to be saved
(they are deleted when exiting the screen)
text.config.fzmm.option.itemEditorBase.a: Auto collapse if editor does not fit

If you play with a very large interface size,
and an editor does not fit on your screen,
the item editor will automatically collapse.
Public key from https://mineskin.org/apikey

It is used to reduce the time when generating skins for
- Player Statue
- Head generator
text.config.fzmm.option.mineskin.publicS:
By activating this the skin you upload will be visible to everyone at https://mineskin.org/gallery

By using the following features you may upload skins
- Player Statue
- Head generator
text.config.fzmm.option.playerStatue.con: Convert skins with alex model in steve model

Convert skins with alex model (3 pixel arms) to steve model (4 pixel arms) in player statue.

Note: player statue only supports steve model and it is not possible to support alex model.
text.config.fzmm.option.textFormat.defau: Item obtained when using Text format and having no item in hand.
text.config.fzmm.option.textFormat.maxRa:
Maximum value for the step between the change of each hue in the rainbow tab,
very high values can cause it to not look like a rainbow.
text.config.fzmm.option.textFormat.minRa: Minimum value for the step between the change of each hue in the rainbow tab.
text.config.fzmm.title: FZMM configs
commands.fzmm.enchant.help: Adds an enchantment to the item in your hand, max level 255
fzmm.gui.autoPlacer.label.baseRequiremen: You cannot use the block where you are standing
fzmm.gui.bannerEditor.option.isShield.to: If true it is a shield, otherwise it is a banner.

fzmm.gui.headGenerator.option.search.too: Suchen Sie unter den verfügbaren Kopf-Namen nach einem Kopf.
text.config.fzmm.option.headGenerator.fo: Force pre-edit none in models/paintable category

Instead of using the selected option for all pre-edits, "none" is used
if it belongs to the "model" or "paintable" category.

This is because these categories typically handle the second layer
of the skin better, preventing issues like those encountered with
the "Textures" category when using the second layer in many skins.
commands.fzmm.old_give.error: An error occurred while obtaining the item '%1$s' from version %2$s to this version.
commands.fzmm.old_give.help: Get an item from a lower version
commands.fzmm.old_give.nbt_required: The NBT is required in the command.
commands.fzmm.old_give.success: Successfully obtained '%1$s' from version %2$s to the current version.
commands.fzmm.version_argument.message: Invalid selected version, allowed range: %1$s to %2$s
fzmm.giveItem.codecError: Getting the item was avoided because an error occurred in Minecraft's codecs. If you believe this is a mistake, you can disable the config from FZMM
text.config.fzmm.option.general.checkVal: Check for valid codec (prevent kick due to invalid item)

Since Minecraft 1.20.5, there are codecs for item components,
where if an item has an invalid component it can cause a kick.

Note: codecs are something like structures that items must adhere to.
fzmm.gui.imagetext.option.invert.tooltip: Invert dots of the braille characters.
text.config.fzmm.option.guiStyle.persist:
If enabled, use a scrollbar that remains visible
when not in use, otherwise use one that fades out.

Note: are a little different visually.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.giveItem: Prevents exceeding the item size limit (8MB)

Limit the size of NBT data for items to prevent hitting the
server limit (8MB).

Note: If the total size of your inventory reaches 8MB or more,
you may be kicked every time you try to join that server.
§cDisable at your own risk.
text.config.fzmm.option.general.removeVi: Improves item modification compatibility with older version servers

By removing the ViaVersion tags from the item when it's modified,
it ensures that the modification isn't removed on a lower version server.

This is because ViaVersion has higher priority due to its tags,
which are added when the item is synced, preventing proper modification
and reverting the item to the first synchronized version.
